Notes: Limited to one for each player
Can be infiltrated to reset the support powers' timer

article_tables.title: Overview
rows: Type: Reinforcement PowerCost: $1600Recharge Time: 7:30Requires Ore PurifierDeploys an Ultra Miner anywhere on the battlefieldUltra Miner is amphibious, more durable, has twice the capacity of Chrono Miners, and is armed with a negation fieldLeft-click icon then left-click on target location (cannot be used on water)

Type: Utility PowerCost: $800Recharge Time: 5:00Requires Tech CenterRestores hit points of friendly units and buildings in a targeted area for 5 instancesEvery instance restores 50 hit points for structures, 100 hit points for infantry, and 200 hit points for vehiclesRemoves EMP from affected unitsDoes not remove Terror DronesLeft-click icon then left-click on target location

Type: Utility PowerRecharge Time: 1:00Requires ChronosphereTeleports friendly structures to and from an area around the Experimental Warpshop or a WarpnodeCannot be used on the Experimental Warpshop itself, Warpnodes, and the PlasmerizerLeft-click icon then left-click on structures to teleport, then left-click on target location near an Experimental Warpshop or Warpnode

Type: Defensive PowerCost: $1000Recharge Time: 6:30Requires Air Force Command HeadquartersUnique to  United StatesCreates a temporary portal around the Experimental Warpshop or a Warpnode that warps in Kingsnake jet fighters which patrol the vicinity and engage enemiesLost Kingsnakes are quickly replaced while the portal lastsStrong vs. Armor, AircraftLeft-click icon then left-click on target location near an Experimental Warpshop or Warpnode

Type: Reinforcement PowerCost: $2600Recharge Time: 7:30Requires Allied War FactoryUnique to  European AllianceDeploys two Paladin Tank Hunters near the Experimental WarpshopStrong vs. ArmorLeft-click to activate
